This is a candidate list of FMG Quality requirements for ballot Implamentation guides:

  • the home page must be 'index.html'
  • the canonical URL must be http://hl7.org/fhir/[realm]/[id]
  • the home page must have a link for 'IG publication history' near the top of the page. It must point at an empty page 'history.html '(FHIR product director maintains the actual history)
  • there must be no invalid xhtml or broken links (from the build)
  • the validation page (/qa/validation.html) must show no errors (hints and warnings are ok)
  • the home page must be clear about the license (creative commons 0)
I will be asking FMG to approve those this week
I will fix the path to the balloted version when I do the actual publication - editors don't need to worry about that
comments on these (or suggestions for other rules) are welcome
So these would be requirements for FMM1, not FMM3, correct? (MnM has a a whole bunch of QA guideline proposals for IGs and their individual artifacts for FMM3)
THese are IG publishing requirements, not linked to maturity levels

http://hl7.org/fhir/[realm]/[id] - do you mean
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/daf/StructureDefinition/daf-core-allergyintolerance
or http://hl7.org/fhir/daf/StructureDefinition/daf-core-allergyintolerance?
ate least it's a global search and replace
